text: The operation "Insert x" should insert E_x, and "Remove x" should remove E_x. The "E_i" in the operation descriptions should be changed into "E_x".

你好，可以解释一下为什么第二个样例有四个吗，我觉得主要的疑问在于same character size的判定是怎么判定的

> 你好，可以解释一下为什么第二个样例有四个吗，我觉得主要的疑问在于same
> character size的判定是怎么判定的

For example, p_1=2, p_2=4 will change the two strings into "aaca" and "abaa". The character set of the first string is {a,c}, and the character set of the second string is {a,b}. These two sets have the same size.
